alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 11:16PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL IBERIA...ST. MARY AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 1215 AM CST... At 1116 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Bayou Sorrel to 15 miles southwest of Cypremort Point. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Cypremort Point, Stephensville, Burns Point, Baldwin, Ellerslie, Patterson Memorial Airport, Glencoe, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island, Amelia, Charenton, Pierre Part, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
